description: This file defines a Python class 'Claude' that extends 'AnthropicClaude' to implement an AWS Bedrock Claude model interface, including methods for client management, request parameter generation, and API invocation (both sync and async), with error handling.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A class representing an AWS Bedrock Claude model, with methods for configuration, client management, and API invocation.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Converts the model instance to a dictionary including request parameters.

methods.name: get_client
methods.description: Retrieves or creates the AWS Bedrock client for synchronous operations.

methods.name: get_async_client
methods.description: Retrieves or creates the AWS Bedrock async client for asynchronous operations.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Generates request parameters for API calls based on instance attributes.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Sends a synchronous request to the API to generate a response based on messages.

methods.name: invoke_stream
methods.description: Streams a response from the API synchronously.

methods.name: ainvoke
methods.description: Sends an asynchronous request to the API to generate a response.

methods.name: ainvoke_stream
methods.description: Streams a response from the API asynchronously.
